DOC.brief_summary: The next generation of personalized medical treatment according to the type of personal genetic information are evolving rapidly. The genome analysis needs systematic infra and database based on personal genetic information Therefore, a big data of genome-clinical information is important.
DOC.brief_title: Personalized Sequence for Thoracic, Esophageal, and H&N Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To determine the feasibility of the use of tumor's molecular profiling and targeted therapies in the treatment of advanced cancer and to determine the clinical outcome(PFS, duration of response and overall survival) of patients with advanced cancer, the investigators are going to take a fresh tissue of patients and process molecular profiling.
DOC.criteria: metastatic, histologically confirmed NSCLC, head & Neck Cancer, Esophageal cancer
